titleStmt.title: Linking from Wikidata to the research environment
titleStmt.author: Pietro Liuzzo

revisionDesc.change: encoded as part of new release

body.p: Linking to and from Wikidata is very useful. There is a dedicate property to align entities in Wikidata with their identifier in the BM research environment. P7846: Beta maṣāḥǝft ID. See for example how it is used here.

Anything that has an identifier in Beta maṣāḥǝft could be linked from it corresponding entity in Wikidata, also repositories, persons, ethinic groups and manuscripts. To contribute to Wikidata please follow the dedicate guidance there. It is extremely easy.
